CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Marca__c, 'BRMX'), RIGHT(TEXT(Account.Responsavel__c), LEN(TEXT(Account.Responsavel__c)) - 6), IF(ISPICKVAL(Marca__c, 'DSEM'), RIGHT(TEXT(Account.Reponsavel_DSEM__c), LEN(TEXT(Account.Reponsavel_DSEM__c)) - 6), RIGHT(TEXT(Account.Responsavel_NEOGEN__c), LEN(TEXT(Account.Responsavel_NEOGEN__c)) - 6)))
CustomField.label: Supervisor
